location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Mr Willock of the Resident's return from Shiraz on 17 October 1824, and his intention to depart Bushire for Muscat on 9 November 1824 aboard the HC Cruizer Benares. It notes that the Resident intends to undertake his annual tour of the Arabian coast, and that Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach will be placed in charge during his absence.
